modName: Player storage chests - Keep your loot safe
summary: A simple mod that adds easily accessible and safe storage chests in the main cities of Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][i][b][center][size=4]"You are carrying too much to be able to run"
[/size][/center][/b][/i][/size][/font][u][b][size=4][center][/center]
[/size][font=Georgia][size=4]Description[/size][/font][/b][/u][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][font=Georgia][size=2]
[/size][/font][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=2]We have all had this message appear on our screen and all wanted to rip our hair out.[/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=2] The truth is, most of us are carrying around items in our inventory that are useless and not necessary to have on your person. But fast traveling to a city where you own property takes time and you loose your place if you are in the middle of the wilderness. That is, if you even own property, its expensive, and an adventurer like you doesn't have the time to settle down!

[/size][/font][center][font=Georgia][size=2]This mod adds easily accessible and safe, non-re-spawning storage chests in the main cities and villages of Skyrim. [/size][/font][/center]

[center][font=Georgia][size=4][u][b]Locations [/b][/u][/size]

- College of Winterhold

- Fakreath

- Dawnstar

- Markarth

- Morthal

- Solitude

- Whiterun

- Windhelm[/font]

And the village of Riverwood for beginners[font=Georgia]
[/font][/center][font=Georgia][size=2][size=4][b][u]Compatibility[/u][/b][/size]

Because I have placed the chests mostly in front of inns and houses orÂ  important buildings this should be compatible with nearly any mod that
alters cities and villages. I myself use [/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12110]Beautiful Whiterun[/url] and [/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60439]JK's Riverwood[/url] and there appear to be no issues.

[/size][/font]
[font=Georgia][font=Georgia][u][b][size=4]Versions[/size][/b][/u][/font]

[size=2][b]Version 1.0[/b]
- Chests in all Cities and Riverwood
- Chests are empty to begin with

[b]Version 1.1[/b]
- Chests are in all cities and Riverwood
- Chests in Whiterun and contain helpful items for low level players

[b]Version 1.3[/b]
- Chests only in Whiterun and Riverwood
- [/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=2]Chests contain helpful items for low level players[/size][/font]



[font=Georgia][center][/center][/font]
author: Tiokaro
